column5:
The Masters in Geospatial Data Science and Modelling will equip you with specialist geospatial, analytical, programming and modelling skills that can be applied to data in a broad range of sectors.
              


              You will get hands-on experience and gain a practical understanding of geospatial statistics. Computationally and mathematically literate graduates with the ability to address geospatial problems are in increasing demand across industries.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
